extensions.name: Default Subnetpools
extensions.description: Provides ability to mark and use a subnetpool as the default

extensions.name: Network IP Availability
extensions.description: Provides IP availability data for each network and subnet.

extensions.name: Network Availability Zone
extensions.description: Availability zone support for network.

extensions.name: Auto Allocated Topology Services
extensions.description: Auto Allocated Topology Services.

extensions.name: Neutron L3 Configurable external gateway mode
extensions.description: Extension of the router abstraction for specifying whether SNAT should occur on the external gateway

extensions.name: Port Binding
extensions.description: Expose port bindings of a virtual port to external application

extensions.name: Neutron Metering
extensions.description: Neutron Metering extension.

extensions.name: agent
extensions.description: The agent management extension.

extensions.name: Subnet Allocation
extensions.description: Enables allocation of subnets from a subnet pool

extensions.name: L3 Agent Scheduler
extensions.description: Schedule routers among l3 agents

extensions.name: Tag support
extensions.description: Enables to set tag on resources.

extensions.name: Neutron external network
extensions.description: Adds external network attribute to network resource.

extensions.name: Neutron Service Flavors
extensions.description: Flavor specification for Neutron advanced services

extensions.name: Network MTU
extensions.description: Provides MTU attribute for a network resource.

extensions.name: Availability Zone
extensions.description: The availability zone extension.

extensions.name: Quota management support
extensions.description: Expose functions for quotas management per tenant

extensions.name: HA Router extension
extensions.description: Add HA capability to routers.

extensions.name: Provider Network
extensions.description: Expose mapping of virtual networks to physical networks

extensions.name: Multi Provider Network
extensions.description: Expose mapping of virtual networks to multiple physical networks

extensions.name: Address scope
extensions.description: Address scopes extension.

extensions.name: Neutron Extra Route
extensions.description: Extra routes configuration for L3 router

extensions.name: Subnet service types
extensions.description: Provides ability to set the subnet service_types field

extensions.name: Resource timestamps
extensions.description: Adds created_at and updated_at fields to all Neutron resources that have Neutron standard attributes.

extensions.name: Neutron Service Type Management
extensions.description: API for retrieving service providers for Neutron advanced services

extensions.name: Router Flavor Extension
extensions.description: Flavor support for routers.

extensions.name: Port Security
extensions.description: Provides port security

extensions.name: Neutron Extra DHCP opts
extensions.description: Extra options configuration for DHCP. For example PXE boot options to DHCP clients can be specified (e.g. tftp-server, server-ip-address, bootfile-name)

extensions.name: Resource revision numbers
extensions.description: This extension will display the revision number of neutron resources.

extensions.name: Pagination support
extensions.description: Extension that indicates that pagination is enabled.

extensions.name: Sorting support
extensions.description: Extension that indicates that sorting is enabled.

extensions.name: security-group
extensions.description: The security groups extension.

extensions.name: DHCP Agent Scheduler
extensions.description: Schedule networks among dhcp agents

extensions.name: Router Availability Zone
extensions.description: Availability zone support for router.

extensions.name: RBAC Policies
extensions.description: Allows creation and modification of policies that control tenant access to resources.

extensions.name: standard-attr-description
extensions.description: Extension to add descriptions to standard attributes

extensions.name: Neutron L3 Router
extensions.description: Router abstraction for basic L3 forwarding between L2 Neutron networks and access to external networks via a NAT gateway.

extensions.name: Allowed Address Pairs
extensions.description: Provides allowed address pairs

extensions.name: project_id field enabled
extensions.description: Extension that indicates that project_id field is enabled.

extensions.name: Distributed Virtual Router
extensions.description: Enables configuration of Distributed Virtual Routers.
